sentences.sContent: Ask your father to help you.
Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.sCn: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.sContent: He’s been like a father to me.
sentences.sCn: 对我来说，他就像父亲一样。

sentences.sContent: Steve recently became the proud father of a 7lb 12oz baby girl.
sentences.sCn: 史蒂夫最近自豪地当上了爸爸，有了一个7磅12盎司的女儿。

synos.tran: 父亲，爸爸；神父；祖先；前辈

phrases.pCn: 父与女（动画短片，曾获奥斯卡最佳动画短片奖）
基督教圣父（指上帝）；天主教徒对罗马教皇的尊称

words.tran: 父亲的身分；父权；父性；父道
父亲的慈爱；父亲的风度

trans.tranCn: 父亲，爸爸；神父；祖先；前辈

trans.tranOther: to become the father of a child by making a woman  pregnant
